subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
Decisions and Verdicts
Television
lead_paragraph: “The Curious Case of Curt Flood,” a new HBO Sports documentary, raises the question: what if Flood’s case against baseball’s reserve clause had had a better advocate before the Supreme Court?
